categories: Category:Conflicts involving the Corporate Sector Authority

nodes.text: The CSA-Trianii War started in 2 BBY and went on for at least another three years, until 1 ABY.
The Corporate Sector Authority (CSA) claimed a chain of systems as property ceded to it in its corporate charter with the Galactic Empire. Those systems were previously settled by the Trianii.

The battle happened along the chain of systems claimed by the CSA. The CSA suspected that the Trianii intended to make the taking of their land more trouble than it was worth. An armistice was decided on after seven months of delicate negotiations on both sides of the conflict. Halbreck Dodd was one of the negotiators of the CSA, and Ceenda Bekkar was a chief negotiator of the Trianii.
